"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This song would be included to represent the resilience and determination needed to overcome any obstacles or setbacks in life.
"Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen - This song would be included to represent the joy and happiness in life, and to celebrate the good moments.
"Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen - This song would be included to represent the creativity and individuality that everyone has in life.
"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This song would be included to represent the strength and perseverance needed to achieve goals and dreams.
"The Power of Love" by Huey Lewis and the News - This song would be included to represent the importance of love and relationships in life, and to remind us to cherish the ones we care about.
